summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AutoPromo 400 'chat not found' error fixes. All functionality is working correctly including isUnreachableError helper, retry cascade skipping, and auto opt-out mechanisms.
passed_tests: isUnreachableError helper function exists and detects all specified error messages ('chat not found', 'user is deactivated', 'bot was blocked', 'have no rights to send a message')
sendPromoToUser immediately throws and skips retry cascade when isUnreachableError is true in photo fallback
sendPromoToUser immediately throws and skips retry cascade when isUnreachableError is true in HTML parse retry
400 'chat not found' errors trigger auto opt-out (setOptOut) same as 403 blocked
403 errors still trigger auto opt-out as before
Opt-out check happens before sending (isOptedOut called first in sendPromoToUser)
auto-promo.js has no syntax errors (node --check passes)
All 52 tests in test_group_notifications.js pass (100% success rate)
GET /api/health returns ok with all services running
Backend API health check shows proxy: running, node: running, db: connected
Frontend dashboard loads successfully via FastAPI proxy
FastAPI proxy correctly forwards requests to Node.js backend
Node.js Express server accessible via proxy
